SorcererLevel9Spells.Name: Gate
SorcererLevel9Spells.Description: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence.

SorcererLevel9Spells.Name: Meteor Swarm
SorcererLevel9Spells.Description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range.

SorcererLevel9Spells.Name: Power Word Kill
SorcererLevel9Spells.Description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly.

SorcererLevel9Spells.Name: Time Stop
SorcererLevel9Spells.Description: You briefly stop the flow of time for everyone but yourself.

SorcererLevel9Spells.Name: Wish
SorcererLevel9Spells.Description: Desire is the most powerful spell a mortal creature can cast.
